src:
Jadwal Penerbangan Berantakan, Twitter Sriwijaya Digeruduk Netizen
07 Nov 2019, 10:11 by Danang Sugianto


Foto: Hendra Kusuma

Jakarta - Sriwijaya Air tengah ramai diperbincangkan di Twitter. Jadwal penerbangan maskapai ini berantakan, bahkan ada yang berpotensi dibatalkan.Para pengguna Twitter ramai menggeruduk akun resmi @SriwijayaAir. Ada yang mempertanyakan jadwal penerbangan dengan tiket yang telah dibeli."Gimana nasib tiket sriwijaya ku yg PP UPG-DJJ bulan Feb tahun depan nanti? tiket dari/ke papua itu gaa murah loh @SriwijayaAir gabisa beli dadakan," tutur akun @dianprtww."Thank you sriwijaya air.. 17.15 to 22.00, ka manga di bandara ko," kata akun @si_ipaan"@SriwijayaAir min mau tanya untuk penerbangan ke padang tgl 11 Nov dgn no penerbangan SJ-020 apakah di batalkan?" kata akun @viavero.Selain itu ada juga yang berseteru dengan admin akun @SriwijayaAir. Mereka menumpahkan kekesalannya."Trus solusinya apa? Call center di telepon gak bisa," tulis akun @Rasahrewel"Sya itu tanya kenapa diganti penumpang berhak tau penyebabnya.. lu jngan bertele2 jawab.. pertanyaannya KENAPA PESWAT SJ 182 DIBATALKAN DAN DIGANTI PAKE PESAWAT NAM AIR?," kata akun @bento_inho.Simak Video "Ratusan Penumpang Sriwijaya Air Telantar di Bandara Hasanuddin"[Gambas:Video 20detik](fdl/fdl)
text:
Scruffy Flight Schedule, Twitter Sriwijaya Raided by Netizens
Nov 7 2019, 10:11 by Danang Sugianto


Photo: Hendra Kusuma

Jakarta - Sriwijaya Air is being talked about on Twitter. The airline's flight schedule is in shambles, some even have the potential to be canceled. Twitter users are busy invading the @SriwijayaAir official account. Someone questioned the flight schedule with the tickets that have been purchased. "What about the fate of my Sriwijaya ticket which is PP UPG-DJJ in February next year? The ticket from / to Papua is not cheap. Thank you Sriwijaya air .. 17.15 to 22:00, manga at the airport ko, "said the account @si_ipaan" @SriwijayaAir min want to ask for a flight to Padang on November 11 with flight number SJ-020 is it canceled? " said the account @ viavero.In addition there was also a clash with the @SriwijayaAir account admin. They shed their frustration. "What's the solution? The call center on the phone can't," wrote the @Rasahrewel account. AIR ?, "said the account @ bento_inho.Simak Video" Hundreds of Sriwijaya Air Passengers Stranded at Hasanuddin Airport "[Gambas: Video 20second] (fdl / fdl)
